form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Merkley (for himself, Mr. Wyden, and Mrs. Murray) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Columbia River Basin Restoration program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Columbia River Clean-Up Act of 2025.
Section 123(d)(6) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1275(d)(6)) is amended by striking 2020 and 2021 and inserting 2026 through 2030.
